subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Football
lead_paragraph: The Vikings’ proposal for building a $1.1 billion N.F.L. stadium on a Superfund site in Arden Hills, Minn., with the public paying about 60 percent of the cost, has faced stiff opposition.
snippet: The Vikings’ proposal for building a $1.1 billion N.F.L. stadium on a Superfund site in Arden Hills, Minn., with the public paying about 60 percent of the cost, has faced stiff opposition.
